name: test_summary
description: A method to be invoked once all test cases have been successfully completed. This function provides a comprehensive summary of each test case, detailing their input, execution command, expected results, actual results, and pass status.

test_cases.description: Extract a list of test cases that were run.

test_input.description: The input data or conditions used for the test.

run_command.description: The command or function that was executed for the test.

expected_result.description: The expected outcome or result of the test.

actual_result.description: The actual outcome or result observed after the test was executed.

is_passed.description: A boolean indicating whether the test passed or failed.
